description:
Workspace simplifier - The only way to organize your workspace and boost your productivity

Rambox is a workspace organizer that allows you to unify as many applications as you want, all in one place.
It is perfect for those who care about productivity while working with many business and personal apps.
Changelog
Improvements
- Adds the option to choose between rounded or sharp corners for the apps.
Fixes
- Fixes UI glitches in some Windows 11 & macOS Sequoia devices.
- Profiles maintenance settings are not working as they should.
- Linux:  Use the native titlebar to ensure compatibility between distros.
- Horizontal layout: Tabs without labels show an empty space where the label should be.
- When the app has an empty title, the Quick Settings are not displayed correctly.
- macOS:  Sonoma & Sequoia devices are detected as "macOS Unknown".
- Prevent issues while loading new themes.
- Spacing between tabs is not equal.
- Linux: Restore Auto-hide menu bar option in General Settings.
